Plot: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.
Title: Get Him to the Greek
Actors: Russell Brand, Rose Byrne, Tyler McKinney, Zoe Salmon
tomatoConsensus: Thanks to a suitably raunchy script and a pair of winning performances from Jonah Hill and Russell Brand, Get Him to the Greek is one of the year's funniest comedies.
